"Festival Crashers":
"Soon it will be the ever enjoyable
Lunar New Year!
Everyone's busy preparing for the
celebrations
but a bit of an incident is happening!
D-arkers have been seen causing a disturbance
in the residential area! On top of that, dragorii
have showed up, it's pandemonium! If they keep
it up the celebration will be ruined... If something
isn't done soon this is really gonna be a mess!!"

"もうすぐ楽しい旧暦正月！
お祝いの準備で大忙しなのに
それどころじゃない事件が起きているの！
ダーカーが市街地に現れて暴れてるって！！
他にも龍族まで現れて大混乱だとか！
このままじゃお祝いが台なしよ……
早くなんとかしないと
困ったことになっちゃうよー！！"
